title: Crypto news: Binance launches Arkham (ARKM) - The Cryptonomist
content:
Crypto news: Today Binance announced the launch of Arkham (ARKM), the native token of the Arkham Project.

This is the 32nd project launched on Binance’s Launchpad, and the sale of ARKM tokens will follow the platform’s classic subscription format.

Starting on 11 July 2023, and for seven days, the registration of users’ BNB balances will take place in order to allocate tokens, and in the end the average amount of the six days will be counted, using the calculation of the average daily BNB balance.

The calculation mechanism used to record the daily BNB balance has recently been changed, and it is no longer a snapshot at a certain precise time.

In fact, each day the average daily BNB balance is calculated, including BNB held in regular Binance accounts, in trading bot accounts, in secondary accounts, in Binance Crypto Loans Collateral Margins, and in other accounts.

The average daily spot account balance is calculated using the sum of hourly snapshots of the spot account BNB balance on a given day divided by 24 (hours).

Crypto news: the sale of Arkham tokens (ARKM) on Binance

In total, a maximum of 50 million ARKM tokens will be distributed via the launchpad, out of the existing one billion, and each user can receive a maximum of 300,000.

So a maximum of 5% of the total supply will be distributed at this stage.

The price for this Public Sale is $0.05, and the exact price in BNB will be determined before the subscription. In fact, the Token Sale is in the form of a subscription, and the purchase will only be payable in BNB.

The preparation period, which is precisely from 00:00 hours (UTC) on 11-July-2023 to 00:00 hours (UTC) on 17-July-2023, will only serve to determine the maximum amount of BNB that can be committed later during the Token Sale.

This amount will be calculated based on the average daily BNB balances held by users.

Eligible users will then have 24 hours from 06:00 (UTC) on 17 July to 06:00 (UTC) on 18 July to subscribe, which will allow them to purchase new tokens by committing the desired amount of BNB.

Once committed, the BNB tokens will be locked, and will not be usable for other functions, such as transfers, withdrawals or trading, until the final token distribution.

The final distribution will occur as of 07:00 AM (UTC) on 18-July-2023 with direct crediting to the spot wallet.

Arkham Project

Arkham uses artificial intelligence to deanonymize the blockchain so as to try to reveal the people and companies involved in crypto transactions.

ARKM is the utility token native to the Arkham platform, and is also used for governance.

Arkham has two main components, namely an analytics platform and an Intel Exchange.

The analytics platform provides data and analysis through entity pages for individuals, companies, and others, showing current and historical funds and transactions.

It also has token pages that show major holders, major transactions, and exchange flows. Finally, it allows instant alerts to be triggered for transactions that match custom parameters.

In contrast, the Arkham Intel Exchange allows anyone to buy and sell information.

The project has raised more than $10 million during two rounds of equity funding.

Investors include Tim Draper, Bedrock Capital, Wintermute Trading, GSR Markets, and co-founders Palantir and OpenAI.

The total supply of ARKM tokens is 1,000,000, and the circulating supply at the time of listing on Binance will be 150,000,000, or 15.00%.

According to Arkham, the deanonymization of pseudonymous blockchain metadata will lead to unprecedented transparency in the crypto world, and push the industry toward mass adoption.

Arkham’s Intel-to-Earn economy incentivizes large-scale information provisioning, and makes it available to all, providing clarity and transparency.

title: Binance Launchpad Introduces Arkham (ARKM) Token Sale! - Crypto Times
content:
In a recent tweet, Binance, the popular cryptocurrency exchange, has officially announced the 32nd project on Binance Launchpad – Arkham (ARKM). The token sale for Arkham will follow the Launchpad subscription format, with user BNB balances being recorded starting from 11 July 2023.

The recording of user BNB balances will take place over a six-day period, from 11 July 2023 to 17 July 2023. The final BNB holding amount for each user will be determined as the average of the six days, using the Daily Average BNB Balance calculation method previously announced.

Here are some of the details of the ARKM token sale:

The token name is Arkham (ARKM)

The Launchpad hard cap is set at $2.5 million. Each user has a hard cap of $15,000 (300,000 ARKM).

The total token supply is 1,000,000,000 ARKM, with 50,000,000 ARKM (5% of the total token supply) allocated to Binance Launchpad.

The public sale token price is 1 ARKM = $0.05 USD, with the price in BNB to be determined prior to the subscription period.

The token sale will be conducted in a subscription format, with BNB as the only supported cryptocurrency. The subscription timeline consists of different periods like the preparation period, the subscription period, the calculation period, and the final token distribution period.

Users should carefully follow the specific timelines provided to ensure their participation in the token sale. To learn more about Arkham (ARKM), interested individuals can refer to Binance Research’s in-depth report available on their website.

It is important to note that users need to complete their account verification and be from an eligible jurisdiction to participate in this token sale. Some countries and regions are excluded from participating, including Belarus, Cuba, Iran, the United States, and others, as stated in Binance’s terms and conditions.

title: What Is Arkham Crypto & How to Join ARKM Token Sale on Binance? - CoinCodex
content:
What Is Arkham Crypto & How to Join ARKM Token Sale on Binance?

Binance, the world’s largest cryptocurrency exchange, has announced Arkham as the next project to be featured on Binance Launchpad, a platform allowing users to participate in token sales of up-and-coming crypto projects.

The preparation period for the Arkham initial exchange offering on Binance Launchpad will start on July 11 and last until July 17, 2023. In total, $2.5 million worth of ARKM tokens (at an exchange rate of 1 ARKM = 0.05 USD) will be distributed among participants.

Open Binance Account

What is Arkham?

Arkham Intelligence is a company that provides a blockchain analytics platform where users can track an visualize on-chain activity. The project is now launching the Arkham Intel Exchange, which is an on-chain marketplace for blockchain intelligence. Users who want intel on a cryptocurrency wallet address can make a request on the marketplace, and on-chain researchers can then fulfill the request to earn money.

The Arkham Intel Exchange implements the ARKM token as a utility token. It provides an incentive for users to submit intelligence or contribute to the ecosystem's growth in other ways. Bounty hunters are required to stake ARKM tokens, which is slashed if they provide low-quality intel submissions. The ARKM token is also used as a governance token, giving its holders the power to decide how the Arkham Intel Exchange will evolve over time.

Announcing The World’s First On-Chain Intelligence Exchange



Buy and sell information on the owner of any blockchain wallet address—anonymously, via smart contract. pic.twitter.com/4xr7dLvOjp — Arkham (@ArkhamIntel) July 10, 2023

How to participate in the Arkham token sale on Binance Launchpad

The Arkham team will be selling 50 million ARKM tokens through Binance Launchpad, which corresponds to 5% of the token’s total supply (1 billion tokens). Each token will be sold at a price equivalent to $0.05, which means that the team is looking to raise $2.5 million through the sale.

Here are the important dates you should keep in mind when participating in the Arkham token sale:

Start End Preparation Period July 11 (00:00 AM UTC) July 17 (00:00 AM UTC) Subscription period July 17 (06:00 AM UTC) July 18 (06:00 AM UTC) Calculation period July 18 (06:00 AM UTC) July 18 (07:00 AM UTC) Final token distribution July 18 (07:00 AM UTC) n/a

The maximum investment a single user will be able to make into the Arkham token sale on Binance Launchpad is the equivalent of $15,000. However, not all users will be able to invest this much, as each individual user’s allocation will be determined by their BNB token holdings.

If you want to participate in the Arkham launchpad, you have to open an account on Binance and verify it. For more information, check our guide on how to invest in an IEO on Binance.

Here’s a brief explanation of how to participate in the Arkham Launchpad:

Step 1 : Create an account on Binance

: Create an account on Binance Step 2 : Verify your account

: Verify your account Step 3 : Select Arkham on the Binance Launchpad homepage

: Select Arkham on the Binance Launchpad homepage Step 4 : Commit your BNB

: Commit your BNB Step 5: Wait for the ARKM token distribution on July 18, at 07:00 UTC

For additional information, you can check out the performance of some of the previously completed IEOs on Binance Launchpad:

*Data based on a snapshot taken on July 10, 2023, at 13:00 PM (UTC)

When will the Arkham token sale on Binance start?

Binance will start recording users’ BNB balances for the purposes of the Arkham token sale on July 11 at 00:00 UTC. This will last until July 17 at 06:00 UTC, when the subscription period will be open and eligible users will be able to commit to buying ARKM tokens.

Tokens will be distributed to participants immediately after the token sale concludes, and we can also expect ARKM to be listed for trading on Binance shortly after the token sale.

Following this announcement, it will be interesting to monitor the BNB markets, as demand for the cryptocurrency usually spikes whenever Binance announces a token sale on its Launchpad platform.
